statements: DELETE FROM candidate_screening WHERE screening_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM candidate_screening WHERE screening_result = false
DELETE FROM candidate_application WHERE candidate_id IN (SELECT candidate_id FROM candidate_application WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM candidate_application WHERE candidate_name = 'John' AND candidate_email = 'john@example.com';
DELETE FROM screening_criteria WHERE criteria_name = 'Technical Skills';
DELETE FROM candidate_criteria WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ScreeningReports WHERE candidate_id = 'abcd-1234' AND pass_status = FALSE;
